Package index

Package overview

list_sources()
List Available Data Sources

SIM – Mortality

Deaths from the Mortality Information System (DATASUS FTP, 1996–2024)

sim_data()
Download SIM Mortality Microdata
sim_years()
List Available SIM Years
sim_info()
SIM Module Information
sim_variables()
List SIM Variables
sim_dictionary()
SIM Data Dictionary
sim_cache_status()
Show SIM Cache Status
sim_clear_cache()
Clear SIM Cache

SINASC – Live births

Live births from the Live Birth Information System (DATASUS FTP, 1996–2024)

sinasc_data()
Download SINASC Live Birth Microdata
sinasc_years()
List Available SINASC Years
sinasc_info()
SINASC Module Information
sinasc_variables()
List SINASC Variables
sinasc_dictionary()
SINASC Data Dictionary
sinasc_cache_status()
Show SINASC Cache Status
sinasc_clear_cache()
Clear SINASC Cache

SIH – Hospital admissions

Hospital admissions from the Hospital Information System (DATASUS FTP, 2008–2024)

sih_data()
Download SIH Hospital Admission Microdata
sih_years()
List Available SIH Years
sih_info()
SIH Module Information
sih_variables()
List SIH Variables
sih_dictionary()
SIH Data Dictionary
sih_cache_status()
Show SIH Cache Status
sih_clear_cache()
Clear SIH Cache

SIA – Outpatient production

Outpatient production from the Outpatient Information System (DATASUS FTP, 2008–2024)

sia_data()
Download SIA Outpatient Production Microdata
sia_years()
List Available SIA Years
sia_info()
SIA Module Information
sia_variables()
List SIA Variables
sia_dictionary()
SIA Data Dictionary
sia_cache_status()
Show SIA Cache Status
sia_clear_cache()
Clear SIA Cache

VIGITEL – Telephone survey

Surveillance of Risk Factors for Chronic Diseases (2006–2024)

vigitel_data()
Download VIGITEL microdata
vigitel_years()
List available VIGITEL survey years
vigitel_info()
Get VIGITEL survey information
vigitel_variables()
List VIGITEL variables
vigitel_dictionary()
Get VIGITEL variable dictionary
vigitel_cache_status()
Get VIGITEL cache status
vigitel_clear_cache()
Clear VIGITEL cache

PNS – National Health Survey

National Health Survey microdata and SIDRA API (2013, 2019)

pns_data()
Download PNS microdata
pns_years()
List available PNS survey years
pns_info()
PNS survey information
pns_modules()
List PNS survey modules
pns_variables()
List PNS variables
pns_dictionary()
Download PNS variable dictionary
pns_sidra_data()
Get PNS tabulated data from SIDRA API
pns_sidra_tables()
List PNS SIDRA tables
pns_sidra_search()
Search PNS SIDRA tables
pns_cache_status()
Get PNS cache status
pns_clear_cache()
Clear PNS cache

PNAD Continua

Continuous National Household Sample Survey (2012–2024)

pnadc_data()
Download PNADC microdata
pnadc_years()
List available years for a PNADC module
pnadc_info()
PNADC survey information
pnadc_modules()
List available PNADC modules
pnadc_variables()
List PNADC variables
pnadc_dictionaries()
Download PNADC variable dictionary
pnadc_cache_status()
Get PNADC cache status
pnadc_clear_cache()
Clear PNADC cache

POF – Household Budget Survey

Food security, consumption, and anthropometry (2002–2018)

pof_data()
Download and import POF microdata
pof_years()
List available POF survey years
pof_info()
Get POF survey information
pof_registers()
List POF registers
pof_variables()
List POF variables
pof_dictionary()
Get POF variable dictionary
pof_cache_status()
Get POF cache status
pof_clear_cache()
Clear POF cache

Censo – Population denominators

Census data and population estimates via SIDRA API (1970–2022)

censo_populacao()
Get Census population data
censo_estimativa()
Get intercensitary population estimates
censo_years()
List available Census years
censo_info()
Census information
censo_sidra_data()
Get Census data from SIDRA API
censo_sidra_tables()
List Census SIDRA tables
censo_sidra_search()
Search Census SIDRA tables
